author: hsiaowei
content:
PeerDAS Breakout Room #3 resources

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kr356fArKbI
Meeting notes: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ng2IrCe28kTt1BnIsjtMlKHq2MHgaja24LhFXSvqfJQ/edit?usp=sharing (Thank <@466006586477772831>  again for helping with notes!)

Key items:
- `devnet-1` has many forks that would be hard to recover. See the meeting notes for the issues)
- **ACTION: relaunch `devnet-2` by the end of the week with all the client fixes.**
- Please review "Decouple network subnets from das-core" PR (a potential `devnet-3` update): https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3832
- Teams want to include https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3800 into Pectra so that PeerDAS can be a pure network update (not hard fork).
